name: Unpacking: domestic intimacy and the coming-of-age film
description: Many screen-based narratives focus on packing up and moving house, new starts and teenage bedrooms, or are entirely shot in one room, revealing what we can learn about characters from a domestic environment.

key_work.title: Storyboarding in Unpacking
key_work.brief_description: Part block-placing puzzle, part house decoration game, Witch Beam Games’ Unpacking is an intimate coming-of-age tale that maps the life of an unseen protagonist by asking the player to unpack her house each time she moves.

constellations_primary.description: Many screen-based narratives focus on packing up and moving house, new starts and teenage bedrooms, or are entirely shot in one room, revealing what we can learn about characters from a domestic environment.

start.title: Tomboy
start.creator_credit: Céline Sciamma, Bénédicte Couvreur, ARTE, ARTE France Cinéma, Canal+, CNC, Hold Up Films, Lilies Films, Playtime, Région Ile-de-France and Thomas Grézaud
start.brief_description: A French family moves to a new neighborhood with during the summer holidays. The story follows a 10-year-old gender non-conforming child, Laure, who experiments with their gender presentation, adopting the name Mikäel.

constellations_other.name: Unpacking: domestic intimacy and the coming-of-age film
constellations_other.description: Many screen-based narratives focus on packing up and moving house, new starts and teenage bedrooms, or are entirely shot in one room, revealing what we can learn about characters from a domestic environment.

end.title: Euphoria
end.brief_description: A group of high school students navigate love and friendships in a world of drugs, sex, trauma, and social media.

constellations_other.name: If at first you don't succeed
constellations_other.description: Though originally intended as a laugh, Celeste Baber’s social media posts have become examples of body positivity to her eight million followers and challenge the absurd expectations put on women in society.

constellations_other.name: Unpacking: domestic intimacy and the coming-of-age film
constellations_other.description: Many screen-based narratives focus on packing up and moving house, new starts and teenage bedrooms, or are entirely shot in one room, revealing what we can learn about characters from a domestic environment.

links.description: Euphoria is a highly stylised, high-drama and high-level violence coming-of-age drama set in California. Similarly to Tomboy, the slightly older teenage characters grapple with ideas of queerness, trauma, substance dependence and ruptures in family, friendship and romantic relationships.

start.title: Storyboarding in Unpacking
start.brief_description: Part block-placing puzzle, part house decoration game, Witch Beam Games’ Unpacking is an intimate coming-of-age tale that maps the life of an unseen protagonist by asking the player to unpack her house each time she moves.

end.title: Inside Out
end.creator_credit: Pete Docter, Ronnie del Carmen, Jonas Rivera, Pixar, Walt Disney Pictures, Ralph Eggleston, Josh Cooley, Meg LeFauve and Andrew Jimenez

video_links.name: INSIDE OUT | Trailer 2 - UK | Official Disney UK
INSIDE OUT | New UK Trailer | Official Disney UK

end.brief_description: Growing up can be a bumpy road, and it’s no exception for Riley, who is uprooted from her Midwest life when her father starts a new job in San Francisco. Riley’s guiding emotions— Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness—live in Headquarters, the control centre inside Riley’s mind, where they help advise her through everyday life and tries to keep things positive, but the emotions conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house and school.

constellations_other.name: Unpacking: domestic intimacy and the coming-of-age film
constellations_other.description: Many screen-based narratives focus on packing up and moving house, new starts and teenage bedrooms, or are entirely shot in one room, revealing what we can learn about characters from a domestic environment.

constellations_other.name: From the outside looking in
constellations_other.description: In Marshmallow Laser Feast's Evolver, we journey inside the human body, inhaled through the lungs and swept throughout the cells with breath. Across screen culture, many narratives similarly explore what's under our skin.

constellations_other.name: Houses that move us
constellations_other.description: Our homes are important to us. When they’re good, they’re our havens. If that home changes, or things go wrong, it can affect us very deeply. This constellation looks at the different ways directors and game devs have positioned the home onscreen - from sanctuary, to hostile enemy.

links.description: Inside Out and Unpacking both centre around a young woman who we learn about through their journey of moving house. In Inside Out each of the main character’s emotions are embodied as individual characters to help illustrate the complexities of moving to a new city.

end.title: The Virgin Suicides
end.creator_credit: Sofia Coppola, Fred Roos, Nancy Steiner, Chris Hanley, Dan Halsted, Francis Ford Coppola, Julie Costanzo, American Zoetrope, Muse Productions and Jasna Stefanovic
end.brief_description: A group of male friends become obsessed with five mysterious sisters who are sheltered by their strict, religious parents.

constellations_other.name: Unpacking: domestic intimacy and the coming-of-age film
constellations_other.description: Many screen-based narratives focus on packing up and moving house, new starts and teenage bedrooms, or are entirely shot in one room, revealing what we can learn about characters from a domestic environment.

links.description: As in Unpacking, i The Virgin Suicides gives us an intimate snapshot in to the bedrooms and lives of the four main characters. With a focus on young women, a use of soft dusty colours and the depiction of private/intimate space The Virgin Suicides speaks to a specific experience of adolescence.

start.title: The Virgin Suicides
start.creator_credit: Sofia Coppola, Fred Roos, Nancy Steiner, Chris Hanley, Dan Halsted, Francis Ford Coppola, Julie Costanzo, American Zoetrope, Muse Productions and Jasna Stefanovic

end.title: Tomboy
end.creator_credit: Céline Sciamma, Bénédicte Couvreur, ARTE, ARTE France Cinéma, Canal+, CNC, Hold Up Films, Lilies Films, Playtime, Région Ile-de-France and Thomas Grézaud
end.brief_description: A French family moves to a new neighborhood with during the summer holidays. The story follows a 10-year-old gender non-conforming child, Laure, who experiments with their gender presentation, adopting the name Mikäel.

constellations_other.name: Unpacking: domestic intimacy and the coming-of-age film
constellations_other.description: Many screen-based narratives focus on packing up and moving house, new starts and teenage bedrooms, or are entirely shot in one room, revealing what we can learn about characters from a domestic environment.

links.description: Céline Sciamma’s Tomboy is framed by moving house. Ten-year-old Laure, who is gender non-confirming, moves to an apartment on the outskirts of Paris during the summer. Laure, who adopts the name Mikael, confronts formative ideas of gender expression, approaching teenhood and the complexity of friendships.

end.title: Toy Story
end.creator_credit: John Lasseter, Andrew Stanton, Joe Ranft, Pete Docter, Bonnie Arnold, Ralph Guggenheim, Pixar, Alec Sokolow, Joel Cohen, Joss Whedon, Bud Luckey, Brian M. Rosen, Darwyn Peachey, Mark Thomas Henne, Mitch Prater and Oren Jacob

video_links.name: Toy Story Trailer 1995 | Disney Throwback | Oh My Disney

end.brief_description: Led by Woody, Andy’s toys live happily in his room until Andy’s birthday brings Buzz Lightyear onto the scene. Afraid of losing his place in Andy’s heart, Woody plots against Buzz. But when circumstances separate Buzz and Woody from their owner, the duo eventually learns to put aside their differences.

constellations_other.name: Unpacking: domestic intimacy and the coming-of-age film
constellations_other.description: Many screen-based narratives focus on packing up and moving house, new starts and teenage bedrooms, or are entirely shot in one room, revealing what we can learn about characters from a domestic environment.

constellations_other.name: Flipping through the evolution of animation
constellations_other.description: Animation has come a long way since flip books were popular. These optical toys gave the illusion of movement, but now whole films and special effects are animated entirely through computers.

links.description: Toy Story is an animated classic which, while framed through the lens of toys that come to life, and similar to Unpacking is centered around the process of packing, moving, the intimacy of personal and domestic objects and what we can glean from the characters through their possessions.
